mapper.insert: insert into exam_student (student_id, exam_id, starttime) VALUES (#{student_id}, #{exam_id}, now());
mapper.select: select e.id, e.name, starttime, endtime, u.name teacher_name from exam e, user u where e.id=#{exam_id} and e.teacher_id=u.id

select q.id q_id, q.content q_content, description, type, score, e.id e_id, e.content e_content from question_exam ex, question q left join (select e.id, e.question_id, e.content from example e, question q where e.question_id=q.id and q.type=1) e on q.id=e.question_id where ex.exam_id=#{exam_id} and ex.question_id=q.id

select q.id q_id, type, score, if(type=1, e.id, e.content) e_id from question_exam ex, question q left join example e on q.id=e.question_id where ex.exam_id=#{exam_id} and ex.question_id=q.id and e.correct=1
mapper.insert: insert into answer (exam_student_id, question_id, answer, correct) VALUES (#{exam_student_id}, #{question_id}, #{answer}, #{correct})
